hadith.text: It was narrated that Sa'sa'ah the paternal uncle of Ahnaf, said:"A woman entered upon Aisha with her two daughters, and she gave her three dates. (The woman) gave each of her daughters a date, then she split the last one between them. She (Aisha) said: 'Then the Prophet(ï·º) came and I told him about that.' He said:' Why are you surprised? She will enter Paradise because of that
